gaia::text::MetricAffectingSpan Class Reference

The classes that affect character-level text formatting in a way that changes the width or height of characters extend this class. More...

#include <MetricAffectingSpan.h>

Detailed Description

The classes that affect character-level text formatting in a way that changes the width or height of characters extend this class.

See also:
StyleSpan, TypefaceSpan, SuperscriptSpan, SubscriptSpan
